Who: LEGACY, Tuscon, Perceptor

> Perceptor looking to Legacy said, "i dont know you, but I'm going to go down
> and bring the primes back, or at least one of them"

Legacy nodded, "Come, we must do all that we can to secure the primes.
Without them then all is lost."

It is a short moment before Legacy and hopefully Perceptor are able to
catch up with Tuscon at the edge of the tunnel. His side is much
easier to penetrate as the sides are more sloping, as if made for a
vehicle to drive up from.

Steam is venting from the tunnel entrance making it very difficult to
see as apparently water and magma are meeting violently somewhere much
further inside this tunnel.

Ahead of Tuscon very little can be discerned as the steam seems to
billow out like smoke, but up ahead what sounds like metal scraping on
stone can be heard as if something is being dragged, but quickly
enough the sound stops.

(TAG)

Preston
